outlier_report_generator.py¶

outlier_report_generator.generate_report(data_df, outlier_df)¶
Parameters

  • data_df – A DataFrame of data we are making a report on

  • outlier_df – A DataFrame of outliers we are making a report on

Returns

Nothing

Prints out a report on information involving the outlier values in the passed in DataFrames. Included in the report are number of outliers, total points, percent outliers, mean val, median val, standard deviation, data range, and outlier range.
